user_request: Show the shopping cart on amazon. Add "macbook air" to the cart on amazon
screen_desc: The screenshot shows a browser interface displaying Amazon's homepage. A menu with several options appears for a link, including "Open in new tab," "Open in incognito tab," "Copy link address," "Copy link text," "Download link," and "Share link." The menu is accessed by selecting the link at the top, and the screen also displays various product categories and promotions at the bottom.
